scripts.start: npm run dev-client & npm run dev-server
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run prod-server
scripts.build: npm run create-index && vite build client --outDir assets/dist && npm run delete-index
scripts.final: deno pack server or deno bundle server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run final
scripts.publish: rm -d -r ./node_modules && rm package-lock.json && rm server/deno.lock && git publish && npm i
